docTitle.titlePart:
The partition function of the extended r-reduced
Kadomtsev-Petviashvili hierarchy

byline.affiliation: * Centre de recherches mathématiques, Université de Montréal

front.address: C. P. 6128, succ. centre ville, Montréal, Québec, Canada H3C 3J7

byline.affiliation: * * Department of Mathematics and Statistics, Concordia University,

front.address: 1455 de Maisonneuve W., Montréal, Québec, Canada H3G 1M8
front.div:
Abstract
We derive a particular solution of the extended r-reduced KP hierarchy, which is specified
by a generalized string equation. The work is a generalization to arbitrary r ≥ 2 of Buryak's
recent results of a solution to the extended open KdV hierarchy which corresponds to r = 2.
front.keywords: Keywords. KP hierarchy; tau function; wave function; string equation.
